planet.name: Shield World
planet.description: This world is encompassed by a strange shield of unknown origin. Attempts to scan the surface through the shield are unsuccessful, and it's unknown what lies within.

planet.name: Gemstone World
planet.description: A strange planet with a surface composed of a high volume of gemstones. The high gravity well of the planet is the likely cause, fusing minerals in the core.

planet.name: Chthonian World
planet.description: A planet that was once a gas giant, but is now nothing more than a dense core - the outer layers stripped away by the solar wind of the nearby star.
